name: Sea Serpent
description: A massive serpent-like creature with impressive physical form, it dominates its environment both in water and on land.
memorable: With its ability to grapple and deliver devastating damage, it poses a formidable challenge to adventurers.
goals: Predominantly seeks to overpower and dominate its foes in aquatic territories.
relations: Commonly found near coastal areas or within large bodies of water, may be encountered alongside other aquatic creatures.
environment: Aquatic environments such as oceans and large lakes.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores allow it to deal and withstand significant damage.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence make it less agile and mentally capable.
attacks: Attacks with powerful coils, a sweeping tail, and a piercing bite.
most_powerful_ability: Coils ability not only allows it to deal high bludgeoning damage but also grapples opponents to restrict their movement.
additional_information: Amphibious, can breathe air and water.
Reactive abilities enhance its defensive tactics.
Can attack twice as a reaction when injured.
Can thrash while bloodied for increased damage.
Sinuous ability allows occupying the same space as others.
test_queries: powerful sea monster with a tail
monster that can breathe air and water
massive serpent with deadly melee attacks
